abstract: British Prime Min David Cameron defends MI5, saying surveillance by intelligence service did not contribute to radicalization of Mohammed Emwazi, who has been identified as 'Jihadi John' of several Islamic State beheading videos; says MI5 has used good judgement in difficult situations and prevented terrorist attacks.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister David Cameron spoke after disclosures that a man who posed in ISIS videos of the murder of Western hostages was known to British intelligence.

headline.main: ‘Jihadi John’ Stirs Britain to Defend Spy Agencies
headline.print_headline: ‘Jihadi John’ Stirs Britain to Defend Spy Agencies

snippet: Prime Minister David Cameron spoke after disclosures that a man who posed in ISIS videos of the murder of Western hostages was known to British intelligence.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
